attributes.action: disallow people from using the title "Doctor" in a professional sense unless they have an officially recognised qualification
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It should be illegal to refer to yourself as "Doctor" in a professional sense or for commercial advantage if you do not hold a Medical Doctorate (MD) or Philosophy Doctorate (PhD) in a relevant subject from an officially accredited university.
 However, we believe it is acceptable to call yourself "Doctor" in a non-professional sense, for example in popular music.
